root: ^This is Chobo speaking, the head of communications of Kettler-22T.
^This is a distress signal sent out to the Federal Institute of Exploration, especially that dusty ol' Department of Repairs.
^We on Kettler-22T have a serious problem. Can you send out a repairer to come take a look at it?
^This has been the 86th time trying to contact you, so please contact me back ASAP!
^Thank you for reaching out to the Federal Institute of Exploration's Department of Repairs.
^A special PATCH repairer unit will be dispatched to your location to assess the situation at hand.
^Thank you for your patience, Timothy, Service Desk Intern, out!
